tasks.max.description: Maximum number of tasks to create

topics.description: Comma-separated list of topics to produce to
topics.title: topics

connect.mqtt.hosts.description: Contains the MQTT connection end points.
connect.mqtt.hosts.title: Mqtt connection endpoints

connect.mqtt.username.description: Contains the Mqtt connection user name
connect.mqtt.username.title: Username

connect.mqtt.service.quality.description: Specifies the Mqtt quality of service

connect.mqtt.timeout.description: Provides the time interval to establish the mqtt connection
connect.mqtt.timeout.title: Connection timeout

connect.mqtt.keep.alive.description:
The keep alive functionality assures that the connection is still open and both broker and client are connected to
 the broker during the establishment of the connection. The interval is the longest possible period of time,
 which broker and client can endure without sending a message.
connect.mqtt.keep.alive.title: Keep alive interval

connect.mqtt.client.id.description: Contains the Mqtt session client id
connect.mqtt.client.id.title: Client id

connect.mqtt.ssl.ca.cert.description: Provides the path to the CA certificate file to use with the Mqtt connection
connect.mqtt.ssl.ca.cert.title: CA certificate file path

connect.mqtt.ssl.cert.description: Provides the path to the certificate file to use with the Mqtt connection
connect.mqtt.ssl.cert.title: Certificate key file path

connect.mqtt.kcql.description: Contains the Kafka Connect Query Language describing the sourced MQTT source and the target Kafka topics
connect.mqtt.kcql.title: KCQL commands

connect.progress.enabled.description: Enables the output for how many records have been processed
connect.progress.enabled.title: Enable progress counter

connect.mqtt.converter.throw.on.error.description:
If set to false the conversion exception will be swallowed and everything carries on BUT the message is lost!!;
 true will throw the exception.Default is false.
connect.mqtt.converter.throw.on.error.title: Throw error on conversion

connect.converter.avro.schemas.description: If the AvroConverter is used you need to provide an avro Schema to be able to read and translate the raw bytes to an avro record. The format is $MQTT_TOPIC=$PATH_TO_AVRO_SCHEMA_FILE in case of source converter, or $KAFKA_TOPIC=PATH_TO_AVRO_SCHEMA in case of sink converter
connect.converter.avro.schemas.title: connect.converter.avro.schemas

connect.mqtt.polling.timeout.description: Provides the timeout to poll incoming messages
connect.mqtt.polling.timeout.title: Polling timeout

connect.mqtt.share.replicate.description: Replicate the shared subscriptions to all tasks instead of distributing them
connect.mqtt.share.replicate.title: Activate shared subscriptions replication

connect.mqtt.process.duplicates.description: Process MQTT messages that are marked as duplicates
connect.mqtt.process.duplicates.title: Process Duplicates

transforms.description: Comma-separated list of transformations to apply

config.providers.description: Comma-separated list of config provider aliases
